name: 2020 Kanban Dark Mode
description:
To keep track of work, we use Kanban. 

All of our creative partners have a habit of going to Figma to review designs, so we eliminated project tracking tools for the design team and moved it to Figma.

Kanban Dark Mode leans on Auto Layout to make updating the Kanban Board fast and straightforward.

Enjoy!
